raw_text:
Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 MENUS AND DISPLAYS Pro Line Fusion® Avionics XM GWX – Overlay Menu

age information in white. If the product is stale, the text shows in yellow. If the product age is not available, it displays as white dashes.

SELECTIONS:

NEXRAD NEXRAD is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the NEXRAD overlay.

Lightning Lightning is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the Lightning overlay.

METAR METAR is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the METAR overlay.

Echo Tops Echo Tops is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the Echo Tops overlay.

SIGMET SIGMET is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the SIGMET overlay.

Satellite Satellite is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the Satellite image overlay.

TFR TFR is a single-state toggle to enable or disable the Temporary Flight Restrictions (TFR) overlay.

5th Edition 02 APR 19 5-243

MENUS AND DISPLAYS Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 XM GWX – Forecast Menu Pro Line Fusion® Avionics
